meanings.definition: Two games played consecutively on the same day by the same teams.
meanings.sent1: During the baseball season, fans enjoy watching doubleheaders at the stadium.
meanings.sent2: The team had to play two doubleheaders back-to-back due to the rain delays.
meanings.sent3: The doubleheaders on the schedule made the players tired but happy.
meanings.sent4: Watching two doubleheaders in a row felt like a marathon of excitement.
meanings.sent5: The doubleheaders were a thrilling display of sportsmanship and skill.

meanings.definition: A pair of related events or activities occurring one after the other.
meanings.sent1: Attending both the wedding and the reception felt like experiencing doubleheaders of joy.
meanings.sent2: The doubleheaders of meetings left the team feeling overwhelmed.
meanings.sent3: The doubleheaders of family gatherings made for a busy but fun weekend.
meanings.sent4: Experiencing doubleheaders of celebrations was a delightful whirlwind.
meanings.sent5: The doubleheaders of events kept everyone entertained and engaged.
